Introducing Shiori: A Bootstrap-Based Jekyll Theme

28 Jul 2014

You can customize this section in _includes → post-header.html.

Introduction

Shiori is a Bootstrap-based Jekyll theme. It looks great by default, but you can customize it easily. It supports Bootstrap and Font Awesome classes out of the box.

View on GitHub â†’

Themes

Shiori comes with these color schemes:

Dark

Turquoise

Green

Blue

Purple

Orange

Red

Shiori is written by Elle Kasai.
